channel.title: Who We Are on Logimex International
channel.description: Recent content in Who We Are on Logimex International

item.title: Leadership
item.description:
Our Leadership Team

Logimex International is guided by a team of experienced professionals committed to excellence, integrity, and innovation.

Executive Team

Our leadership brings decades of combined experience across logistics, retail, security, and corporate management.

“Our success is driven by our people and their commitment to getting the job done, every day, safely and efficiently.”

— Chairman, Logimex Group

item.title: Our History
item.description:
Our Journey

Logimex International was founded in 2008 with a vision to revolutionize the logistics industry. What started as a small freight forwarding operation has grown into a global conglomerate spanning multiple industries.

Key Milestones

  • 2008 — Logimex Logistics founded in Jaipur, Rajasthan
  • 2012 — Expanded operations to international markets
  • 2015 — Launched Logimex Retail division
  • 2018 — Established Logimex Security services
  • 2020 — Reached operations in multiple countries
  • 2024 — Celebrated 18 years of industry leadership
